ItemDesc:
The assistance provided by Herta to the Astral Express. Upon use, you can select one item to obtain from the following materials:
· Lifeless Blade
· Arrow of the Demon Slayer
· Key of Knowledge
· Oath of Steel
· Obsidian of Desolation
· Ancestral Hymn
· Sprout of Life
ItemBGDesc: Materials provided to the Express in accordance with the mutual aid contract.\n\n"Since it's mutual aid, save your thanks."
